A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a decent enough movie. The performances were solid. Adam Driver was a standout with his portrayal of Kylo Ren. John Williams DID IT AGAIN! That score was brilliant! Unfortunately\, though the movie has some huge flaws in crucial areas. Some storytelling decisions made no logical sense and at times seemed like it was INTENTIONALLY trying to aggravate Star Wars fans. Some storylines went absolutely nowhere and other characters were absolutely disregarded with their lack of screen time. I LOOOOOVE Star Wars and I really wanted to enjoy this movie but the mistakes of this movie had me saying things like “Really?” and “WTF?” and not in a good way. Unfortunately\, this movie just isn’t good.
